annotations.description: This cocktail was created by Chris Day as a companion drink to his epic God Of War binge playing. For my part it's a wonderful take on a Martini and definite...
annotations.title: The God Of War Inspired Lake Of Nine!

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Fords Gin
.5oz (15ml) Aquavit or .25oz (7.5ml)
.75oz (22.5ml) Dry Vermouth
1 tsp Absinthe

Stir and strain into coupe
Garnish with lemon twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0wjQQnMcX_c
title: Lake of Nine
